nodes.text: A bomb was an explosive device designed to explode under specified conditions. The blazer bomb, electro-proton bomb, Electro-Proton Bomb/Defoliator, gas bomb, molecular purge bomb, plasma bomb, proximity bomb, viral bomb, and VL-61/79 proton bomb were types of bomb that saw use in the galaxy. Bombers were starships designed to strike heavily armored targets and armed with projectile weapons such as proton torpedoes, proton bombs, and concussion missiles.
